Title: Relates to falsely filing an extreme risk protection order
Summary: Establishes the crime of falsely filing an extreme risk protection order to be punishable as a class E felony.
LawCode: Add ยง400.12, Pen L; add ยง6349, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to falsely filing an extreme risk protection order
